PayloadOrganization.description: This value describes the issuing organization of the profile, as displayed to the user

AlertType.description: The type of alert for notifications for this app. None/Banner/Alert

BundleIdentifier.description: Bundle identifier of the target app

SoundsEnabled.description: Whether sounds are allowed for this app.

ShowInLockScreen.description: Whether notifications can be shown in the lock screen.

ShowInNotificationCenter.description: Whether notifications can be shown in notification center.

NotificationsEnabled.description: Whether notifications are allowed for this app.

BadgesEnabled.description: Whether badges are allowed for this app.

PayloadIdentifier.description: A unique identifier for the payload, dot-delimited. Usually root PayloadIdentifier+subidentifier

PayloadType.description: The type of the payload, a reverse dns string

PayloadVersion.description: The version of the whole configuration profile.
